content: GXGBet is really happy to present its first signature campaign !ANN THREAD: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5402686.msg60364404#msg60364404Total Available Spots: 15Full Member Spots available: 10 - 25$/WeekSr/Hero/Legendary: 5 - 50$/WeekRules:Negative trust members are not allowed. Users that receive valid negative trust from DT2 or above while enrolled will be kicked and payment denied.Only constructive posts will be counted. Please do at least 25 quality post/week in way to be elegible for paymentPlease do at least 10 quality post/week in gambling section in way to be elegible for payment1 account per user. Any user found to have alts in the campaign will be kicked and denied payment.Posts in Local, Games & rounds, Off topic, Micro earnings, investor based games, and other signature campaign thread will not be counted.Posts in Beginners and help, speculation, and politics and society will count as half.No other signatures are allowed to be worn while you are in the campaign.Users found to spamm will be banned from the campaign and payment will be denied.Posts will be counted and payments will be made on fridays.Week will end on friday at the 11:00 AM (FORUM TIME), so, please, ensure that you've followed every requirement for that day.Notes:Payments will be directly processed by me.In the case of a rank up, a new slot will only be available if the total enrolled members does not exceed the maximum (15 users).Any rule changes / updates will be posted in the following post. it is your responsibility to check in case of any updates. Post quality will be the main priority in this campaign. Not reaching payout threshold for 2 weeks in a row will result in being kicked from the campaign and being banned from reapplying for 1 week.*I am only managing the campaign. I do not control the payouts themselves, nor am I affiliated with this service. I just look at your posts. If you want to join, first wear the signature based on your rank, then fill this form with the following informations:QuoteName:Post count:Rank:BTC Segwit Address:Profile UID:Then, check here  if comments.author: MinMan
comments.body: Quote from: Gianluca95 on June 23, 2022, 01:12:11 PMI am only managing the campaign. I do not control the payouts themselves, nor am I affiliated with this service. I just look at your posts.This may not be a right argument from a campaign manager.I am not seeing this GXGbet already developed their reputation on bitcointalk.org. When they do not have even an ANN topic, you must work on escrow before start promoting them.

comments.author: Gianluca95
comments.body: Quote from: MinMan on June 23, 2022, 01:18:05 PMQuote from: Gianluca95 on June 23, 2022, 01:12:11 PMI am only managing the campaign. I do not control the payouts themselves, nor am I affiliated with this service. I just look at your posts.This may not be a right argument from a campaign manager.I am not seeing this GXGbet already developed their reputation on bitcointalk.org. When they do not have even an ANN topic, you must work on escrow before getting into promoting them. Here is their ANN thread as I've inserted it into topic: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5402686.msg60364404#msg60364404As I've said, I'm working only as campaign manager.

comments.author: MinMan
comments.body: Quote from: Gianluca95 on June 23, 2022, 01:19:30 PMHere is their ANN thread as I've inserted it into topic: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5402686.msg60364404#msg60364404That topic is only 8 days old. Still, thanks for linking to that. Please add it to OP.Quote from: Gianluca95 on June 23, 2022, 01:19:30 PMAs I've said, I'm working only as campaign manager.But, a campaign manager's biggest responsibility must include hassles-free payout always. Hence, you must work on arranging escrow or we may see another case of delayed pay out like happened here and here.

comments.author: Gianluca95
comments.body: Quote from: MinMan on June 23, 2022, 01:24:24 PMQuote from: Gianluca95 on June 23, 2022, 01:19:30 PMHere is their ANN thread as I've inserted it into topic: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5402686.msg60364404#msg60364404That topic is only 8 days old. Still, thanks for linking to that. Please add it to OP.Quote from: Gianluca95 on June 23, 2022, 01:19:30 PMAs I've said, I'm working only as campaign manager.But, a campaign manager's biggest responsibility must include hassles-free payout as promised.Yes, you're right. That's why I'm here, if payment wouldn't be done, I'll pay by myself, don't worry. Credibility for me is the first thing here, and I don't want to ruin my reputation built in almost 10 years for some bucks.
